Description: Observer initials (first, middle, last name). If no middle initial, substitute with '_'
Wind direction based on 8-pt cardinal compass: 'N', 'NE', 'E', 'SE', 'S', 'SW', 'W', 'NW', or 'NA'=undefined
Wave file ID: Record Program files combining survey ID ('XXX'), year ('YY'), wave file number ('NNN')
Delay between clock time and GPS signal (seconds), 'NA'=undefined
